title: Delay in North East Line service due to signalling fault

updates.text: 8/9 11.06am: NEL service has resumed. Free bus rides have ceased. We are very sorry.
8/9 10.54am: NEL svc has resumed. Free passing by bus & shuttle services are still available btwn Punggol NE17 & Hougang NE14. We are sorry.
08/09, 8.48am: Signalling fault on NEL has resulted in 20min delay. Free bus svc available btw Punggol NE17 & Farrer Park NE08. We are sorry
08/09, 7.54am: NEL svc has resumed. Free buses are still available between Punggol NE17 & Farrer Park NE08. We are sorry.
08/09, 7.39am: NEL delay - To assist with your journey, free bus rides available btwn Punggol NE17 to Farrer Park NE08 near NEL stns.
08/09, 7.19am: NEL svc is delayed due to a signalling fault at Sengkang NE16. Additional travel time of abt 10 minutes may be expected.
